subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
The overall objective of the project is the provision of technical, financial and material assistance to the Mozambican Parliament to become more effective and efficient in conducting its executive oversight function. In order to reach this objective the project is supporting capacity building initiatives that will enable the Parliament to efficiently conduct fiscal oversight of the Budget Cycle, play a more active role in the conceptualization and approval of national development programs and improve its capacity to communicate with the public and civil society through adequate means.
Anticipated outputs include the following:
1.	project management, support, monitoring, and evaluation structures needed to effectively implement the project are established on the office of the General Secretariat of the Parliament;
2.	Improved quality of fiscal oversight function of the Parliament
3.	Member of Parliament are more and more involved in the process of preparation,  approval and oversight of major national development programmes
4.	Contacts between members of Parliament and their electoral cycles are strengthened
5.	A Parliament culture of peace, tolerance and constructive dialogue is promoted
6.	Technical and institutional capacity of the Parliaments and its General Secretariat is strengthened
7.	Capacity of the parliament to communicate with Journalists, civil society, electorate and the general public is strengthened 
Parliamentary development cooperation in Mozambique, to be effective has been administratively directed to the Secretariat General level, but it must involve buy-in and direct participation from the parliamentary leadership. Parliamentary development cooperation in Mozambique is being coordinated between donors and integrated within the existing institutional structure of the parliamentary administration to avoid duplication of structures and ensure capacity development, while at the same time respecting the specific financial management and reporting requirements of partners.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Parliamentary Oversight
